description: Number of distinct nonzero absolute values of sum_{j=1}^n \sigma_j \exp( i \pi j / n ) where \sigma_j = +- 1.
links: J. M. Borwein, D. M. Bradley and D. J. Broadhurst, Evaluations of k-fold Euler/Zagier sums..., Electron. J. Combinatorics, 4 (No. 2, 1997) #N5.
author: _David Broadhurst_
